channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI lawyers question Meta’s role in Elon Musk’s $97B takeover bid
item.description: OpenAI says that Elon Musk met with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to discuss a $97 billion takeover bid of the ChatGPT-maker.

item.title: Rad Power Bikes RadRunner Max Review: Faster and Safer Than Ever
item.description: Rad Power Bikes’ newest high-end RadRunner Max has been upgraded to be faster and safety features, like radar car detection.

item.title: The Best Google Pixel Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed: Which Model to Buy, Cases and Accessories, Feature Drops
item.description: Here’s a guide to all the models—plus Pixel case recommendations and smart software tricks to try.

item.title: The Best Deals From REI’s 2025 Labor Day Sale
item.description: Shop these end-of-summer deals on REI, Nemo, MSR, Coleman, Fjällräven, and other outdoor brands.

item.title: OpenAI announces New Delhi office as it expands footprint in India
item.description: OpenAI has started hiring in India as it looks to expand its presence in the fast-growing South Asian tech market.

item.title: Waymo approved to start autonomous vehicle testing in New York City
item.description: It's the first permit of its kind, and a crucial step along the path toward launching a true robotaxi service in the Big Apple.

item.title: This Extremely Cute Bean Wants to Help You Stop Doomscrolling
item.description: Focus Friend, an app to help people reduce their screen time, is dominating app downloads. But can it actually keep you off your phone?

item.title: Best Massagers for When You’d Rather Not Pay Spa Prices (2025)
item.description: Don’t cancel physical therapy just yet, but these portable, at-home massagers might be the hack you need after stressful days.

item.title: As India bans real-money games, Dream Sports, MPL start pulling the plug
item.description: Several Indian startups, including Dream Sports, MPL, and Zupee, are shutting down their real-money games after parliament passed a bill banning such ...

item.title: Anduril, Blue Origin to study how to transport cargo from orbit to Earth for the Pentagon
item.description: Blue Origin and Anduril notched small contracts that could revolutionize how the Pentagon transports cargo.
